1.5.2.name: wordpress/wp-automedia
1.5.2.description:
This is a very basic plugin, intended to add your uploads directly to your Media Library for easy publishing. No more moving files around from phones and cameras in order to publish them. Simply batch upload or use the WordPress AutoMedia plugin for Android powered phones (iPhone App and Microsoft Phone App coming soon!)

Download the Android App at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vedstudio.wpam

See also http://blog.vedstudio.com/wordpress-automedia/

Note: I'm all ears for future versions. Tell me what you would like to see improved/added/changed and I will do my best. Thanks for downloading!
